name: npl-protocol-handler
description: npl-protocol-handler is a general-purpose event handler for Evernode HotPocket NPL events with support for arbitrary application-specific protocols.

scripts.test1: hpdevkit clean && npm link && cd example1 && npm link npl-protocol-handler && npm start
scripts.test2: hpdevkit clean && npm link && cd example2 && npm link npl-protocol-handler && npm start

author: @marklikeapenny
